alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Egypt Lake-Leto, or near Tampa, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene, University, Greater Northdale, Tampa International Airport, Keystone, West Park, Busch Gardens, Raymond James Stadium, Westchase, University Of Tampa, Carrollwood, Town N Country, and University Of South Florida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
